tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  action VARCHAR(100),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action VARCHAR(255),
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE policy_documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document TEXT,
    created_date DATE,
    approved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_details TEXT,
    created_date DATE,
    reviewer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE policy_documents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_id INT,
  document_text TEXT,
  creation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  report_text TEXT,
  report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(255),
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    document_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE policy_documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    reviewer VARCHAR(255),
    findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_actions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    created_by VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);
